name: 3 Blind Ass Mice
description:
I decided to take a break from my larger projects and take part in the GMC game jam (under the theme Nursery Rhymes).

This game has 2 more days left of development but I had to finish early due to IRL stuff. This is my 5th game or so over a 9 month period, so please bare that in mind, enjoy!

-Poontangular
